summary: A young woman frets upstairs in her family's country manor on her wedding day, fearful she's about to marry the wrong man. Downstairs, her fiancé and her former lover grow increasingly anxious.
cast: Elizabeth McGovern|Eva Traynor|Paola Dionisotti|Sophie Stanton|Felicity Jones|Elizabeth Webster|Kenneth Collard|Ellie Kendrick|Zoë Tapper|Luke Treadaway|Ben Greaves-Neal|Luke Ward-Wilkinson|Olly Alexander|Joanna Hole|John Standing|Fenella Woolgar|Mackenzie Crook|Julian Wadham|James Norton|Barbara Flynn|Camilla Corbett|Oliver Gilbert|Emil Lager|Melanie Gray|Edward Saxby|Jonathan Saxby|Jim Conway|John MacDonald|Kevin Hudson
keywords: sex|based on novel|vomiting in a toilet|cricket the sport|drinking from a bottle
title: Cheerful Weather for the Wedding
